hero.heading: Full-Stack Developer
hero.paragraph: Currently based in Asturias, Spain. I've achieved my diploma in Full-Stack Web Development at City of Bristol College. I'm passionate about pixel-perfect designs and reusable code!

uxUi.heading: UX / UI
uxUi.paragraph: Creating designs that are visually appealing, fully responsive and accessible. Ensuring a great user experience is a top priority for me, implementing high accessibility standards to make my designs inclusive and user-friendly.

development.heading: Development
development.paragraph: Specialized in working with TypeScript, React (Next), and Node. These technologies allow me to build dynamic and efficient web applications.

performance.heading: Performance
performance.paragraph: Placing great importance on writing code that delivers high performance. While optimizing for speed and efficiency, I also prioritize code readability and maintainability.

projects.name: Black Dog Shop
projects.description: eCommerce for skateboards and clothing products with login system. Allows anonymous or registered users to checkout using Stripe payments API. Registered users have the option to save delivery information and review their order history.

projects.name: BonTeeth
projects.description: Platform for booking and managing appointments with login system. There is two possible scenarios for the usage of this app, as a regular user (customer) or as an admin (business owner), each of them naturally providing different features. I can provide details for admin account on request.

projects.name: Guess the Word
projects.description: Interactive game for learning english vocabulary. Given a description of the word, you have to guess the missing characters. Game is powered by two free RESTful API.

paragraphs: Hello! My name is Ricardo Albarenque, but feel free to call me Rico. I was born in Argentina and raised in Spain. Recently moved back to Spain after seven years in London.

Technology has always been a part of my life, starting from my early days as a kid when I got my hands on my first PC with Windows 98. When my family moved to Spain during my teenage years, I ventured into website development using tools like Adobe Dreamweaver, Flash, and Photoshop. As part of a big family, we had to be resourceful, so my father and brothers would collect parts from various computers to build new setups or upgrade existing ones.

As I grew up, my focus shifted from websites to music, particularly drumming. Drumming and coding are my two greatest passions. Recently, I decided to rekindle my interest in coding and joined a bootcamp. Shortly thereafter, I enrolled in college to study Full-Stack Web Development.

I consider myself someone who values creating high-quality work. I have always been driven by a competitive spirit, constantly pushing myself to the limits and striving to excel in everything I do. I enjoy taking on challenges and solving problems, which is why I rediscovered my love for coding.

Apart from coding, I love spending time in nature, whether it's going for hikes or simply enjoying the outdoors. Family and friends are also very important to me. I have a competitive streak when it comes to gaming, particularly in FPS and MMO genres. Additionally, I enjoy watching movies and exploring topics like psychology and astronomy through books and videos.

paragraphs: ¡Hola! Mi nombre es Ricardo Albarenque, pero siéntete libre de llamarme Rico. Nací en Argentina y crecí en España. Recientemente he regresado a España después de siete años en Londres.

La tecnología siempre ha sido una parte de mi vida, empezando en mi niñez cuando tuve mi primer ordenador con Windows 98. Cuando mi familia se mudó a España durante mi adolescencia, empecé con el desarrollo de sitios web utilizando Adobe Dreamweaver, Flash y Photoshop. Como miembro de una familia numerosa, y con pocos recursos disponibles, mi padre y mis hermanos juntábamos piezas de ordenadores y armábamos o mejorábamos los que ya teníamos.

Según iba creciendo, mi atención se inclinó más hacia la música, particularmente la percusión. Hace un par de años, me volví a interesar por la programación y me apunté a un bootcamp. Poco después, me apunté en formación profesional para estudiar Desarrollo Full-Stack. La batería y programación son mis dos pasiones en la vida.

Me considero una persona que valora el trabajo de calidad. Siempre he tenido un carácter competitivo, constantemente mejorando y superando mis límites para destacar en todo lo que hago. Disfruto con los retos y resolviendo problemas, es por lo cuál descubrí mi pasión por la programación.

Además de la programación, me gusta pasar tiempo en la naturaleza, tanto sea pasear haciendo rutas o simplemente disfrutando la naturaleza en sí. La familia y los amigos también son muy importantes y un gran apoyo. También suelo jugar competitivamente en videojuegos del género FPS y MMO. Adicionalmente, me encanta ver películas y aprender sobre psicología y astronomía a través de libros y documentales.
